sections.summary: to obtain an administrative assistant position where i can apply my 10 years of customer service, gift of multitasking, and professional experience to provide a team with a high quality of consistent supportive experience. â â highlights competent and reliable professional, committed to top quality work organized and multitasking person resourceful in solving problems, maximizing 10 years' experience working in the customer service industry resources, leading, delegating and negotiating entrepreneur skills; forward thinker, always trying to improve things or collaborate easily with co-workers and work well determine functionality independently hard worker, quick learner, and ability to assume responsibility possess excellent communication and inter-personal work well under pressure as part of a team skills responsible, resourceful, and able toâ implement change or policies perform effectively despite sudden deadlines and efficient, supportive and flexible changing priorities ability to work in a fast-paced, intense environment smoothly proven ability to identify, analyze, and solve problems a visionary and creative person meticulous worker; attentive to quality and highly reliable self-starter; can be counted on to detail oriented complete assignments and manage projects able and willing to assist co-workers, supervisors, and clients in a planner, sets goals, and meets deadlines cooperative manner committed to providing total quality work experienced in customer relations dependable employee with common sense and a variety of skills self-motivated; able to learn on own initiative work well under pressure to meet deadlines excellent record of dependability and reliability work cooperatively with a wide range of personalities versatile and multi-skilled person proven ability to gain customer's confidence and trust relates easily with all levels of co-workers and customers excellent verbal and written communication skills
